trans-unit.source: Describes desired expansion behavior of an inertia processor.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver ønsket utvidelse virkemåten til en treghet prosessor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion deceleration, in coordinate units per millisecond squared.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ønsket utvidelse-deselerasjon i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder viser hvordan.

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> properties; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er utelukker hverandre i <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>Egenskaper; innstillingen angis for egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>til `NaN`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `NaN`.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis under treghet prosessoren kjører; Ellers unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion deceleration, in coordinate units per millisecond squared.
trans-unit.target: Viser hvordan i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder deselerasjon ønsket utvidelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion along the x-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ønsket utvidelsen langs x-aksen, i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelse må være proporsjonalt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen må være lik verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>egenskapen når treghet prosessoren starter; ellers et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er utelukker hverandre i <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>egenskapen; angi denne egenskapen settes <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>til `NaN`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `NaN`.

trans-unit.source: DesiredExpansionX must be a finite, non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: DesiredExpansionX må være et begrenset, ikke-negativt tall.

trans-unit.source: The rate of expansion is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hyppigheten av utvidelse fastsettes av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis under treghet prosessoren kjører; Ellers unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion along the x-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Den ønskede utvidelsen langs x-aksen, i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion along the y-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ønsket utvidelsen langs y-aksen, i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelse må være proporsjonalt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen må være lik verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>egenskapen når treghet prosessoren starter; ellers et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er utelukker hverandre i <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>egenskapen; angi denne egenskapen settes <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>til `NaN`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `NaN`.

trans-unit.source: DesiredExpansionY must be a finite, non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: DesiredExpansionY må være et begrenset, ikke-negativt tall.

trans-unit.source: The rate of expansion is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hyppigheten av utvidelse fastsettes av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis under treghet prosessoren kjører; Ellers unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion along the y-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Den ønskede utvidelsen langs y-aksen, i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial average radius, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir opprinnelige gjennomsnittlig radien i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the inertia processor to calculate the scale factor for an element that is expanding.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes av treghet prosessoren til å beregne skaleringsfaktoren for et element som er å vise.

trans-unit.source: For instance, if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> properties are set to 3.75, this informs the inertia processor that the starting expansion velocity is 3.75 coordinate units per millisecond along both axes (expansion must be proportional).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>egenskapene til 3,75, dette informerer treghet prosessoren Start utvidelse hastighet er 3.75 koordinaten enheter per millisekunder langs begge akser (utvidelse må være proporsjonalt).</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scale factor associated with this rate of expansion depends upon the size of the element that is expanding.
trans-unit.target: Skaleringsfaktoren som er forbundet med denne antall utvidelse er avhengig av størrelsen på elementet er å vise.

trans-unit.source: For a small element, this expansion velocity represents a larger scale factor than for a large element.
trans-unit.target: Denne utvidelse hastighet representerer en større skaleringsfaktoren enn for en stor elementet for en liten elementet.

trans-unit.source: You inform the inertia processor of the element size by setting the InitialRadius property.
trans-unit.target: Du informere treghet prosessoren av størrelsen på elementet ved å angi egenskapen InitialRadius.

trans-unit.source: The default value for the InitialRadius property is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen InitialRadius er 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are any finite number greater than or equal to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier er et begrenset tall større enn eller lik 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The initial average radius, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Første gjennomsnittlig radien, i koordinaten enheter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den første utvidelse hastigheten langs x-aksen, i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelse må være proporsjonalt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen må være lik verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>egenskapen når treghet prosessoren starter; ellers et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `NaN`.

trans-unit.source: Leaving this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> unchanged from the default or setting this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> to zero (0) will disable expansion inertia.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du forlater denne egenskapen og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>uendret fra standard eller angi egenskapen og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>til null (0) deaktiverer utvidelse treghet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis under treghet prosessoren kjører; Ellers unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The initial expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige utvidelse hastigheten langs x-aksen, i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den første utvidelse hastigheten langs y-aksen, i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelse må være proporsjonalt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen må være lik verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>egenskapen når treghet prosessoren starter; ellers et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `NaN`.

trans-unit.source: Leaving this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> unchanged from the default or setting this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> to zero (0) will disable expansion inertia.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du forlater denne egenskapen og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>uendret fra standard eller angi egenskapen og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>til null (0) deaktiverer utvidelse treghet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis under treghet prosessoren kjører; Ellers unntak et.

trans-unit.source: The initial expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige utvidelse hastigheten langs y-aksen, i koordinaten enheter per millisekunder.
